meanings.definition: Supplementary material at the end of a book or document.
meanings.sent1: The appendices in the book contained additional information about the topic.
meanings.sent2: I always check the appendices at the end of a book for more details.
meanings.sent3: The appendices at the back of the book were like a treasure trove of extra facts.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a library with appendices full of fascinating stories.
meanings.sent5: The appendices were like secret compartments revealing hidden knowledge.
